2. /etc/syslog.conf
上一页 第 12 章 syslog, klogctl - read and/or clear kernel message ring buffer; set console_loglevel 下一页

2. /etc/syslog.conf

*.*			@172.16.0.9

所有日志将被重定向到172.16.0.9

[root@dev1 test]# service syslog restart
Shutting down kernel logger:                               [  OK  ]
Shutting down system logger:                               [  OK  ]
Starting system logger:                                    [  OK  ]
Starting kernel logger:                                    [  OK  ]
[root@dev1 test]#
上一页 上一级 下一页
第 12 章 syslog, klogctl - read and/or clear kernel message ring buffer; set console_loglevel 起始页 3. logger
